projectDesc.p: David Livingstone writes this portion of his diary entries over the recto and verso of an envelope (RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_002r_172br and RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_002v_172bv). RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_002v_172bv bears the handwritten address "Dr. Kirk Consulate Zanzibar care of H.M. Commissioner Seychelles". This envelope was originally sent to Livingstone along with a separate enclosure (RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_001r_172ar and RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_001v_172av) that Livingstone has also used to record diary entries. Livingstone's text is what is transcribed and represented in the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI) P5 XML encoding. In addition, the present folio includes the the phrase "172b ult" in the upper right-hand corner in a second, unknown hand.

revisionDesc.change: 2011-06-12 Adrian S. Wisnicki initial transcription and XML encoding.

figure.figDesc: Livingstone records a series of calculations in pencil at the center of the page as well as two inked squiggles to correct ink flow.
